characterDescription: Thaspic is a man from the Purelake who passes by Ishikk pulling a small raft. The raft is stacked with a few piles of cloth that Thaspic has probably taken out for washing. He asks Ishikk how the fishing is, then tells him that he lost a shirt while washing. He then tells Ishikk that his visitors have arrived and that they are at Maib's house.
